Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal text on recto (11 ll.) and names of 16 witnesses on verso. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Farming lease granted by the Blemmy Khau son of Ala to the Nubian Patous son of Panomieus and Kha-Hor son of Patous. Date. year 8 Choiak 2 of Ptol. Philometor = BC. 173 Jan. 5."
Curator's comments: Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT. Bibliography Felber, H., Demotische Ackerpachtverträge (ÄA 58). Wiesbaden, 1997, pg 119, no.135. Text 4 in Shore's Manuscript Catalogue of Demotic Gebelein Papyri in the British Museum. Publication in progress (C J Martin).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (328) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/328)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: creased, fractured, loss, delaminating Black ink Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Window verso Binding: leather (deteriorated) Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair - lacunae
